command.name: full-mesh
command.abstract: create a full-mesh of BGP sessions

description.p: This command creates a full-mesh of iBGP sessions between the routers that are member of the specified domain.

Example:
bgp add router 1 0.1.0.0
bgp add router 1 0.1.0.1
bgp add router 1 0.1.0.2
bgp add router 1 0.1.0.3
bgp domain 1 full-mesh
